Metadata exposed applied profiles (balanced+files) and took_ms=3, aiding reproducibility.
Documented that the daemon auto-spawns, keeps multiple project roots hot, and streams diagnostics/coverage for every search.
Clarified that Doctor + self-heal replace all manual cache deletions or rg fallbacks, keeping Navigator fully autonomous for agents.
Diagnostics-only mode streams the heartbeat then prints final diagnostics JSON to stdout (no hits payload).
Compact output lists query_id + hit ids, and literal fallback emits `literal::` hits when only raw strings match.
NDJSON format now replays daemon events (diagnostics/top_hits/final) verbatim, so clients can pipe them without reformatting.
References arrive as separate definitions/usages arrays with short previews, shrinking payloads and avoiding client-side resorting.
